name: Create new documents from a template in Plumsail Documents from new events in Teachable
description:
Every time a new event is created in Teachable, a new document will be instantly created from a template in Plumsail Documents.

This template was created by a 3rd party and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: support@plumsail.com.
